story_06_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’re here, everyone!
This is where I do all of my training.
story_06_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
A bunch of my Trainer friends like to
hang out around here, too!
story_06_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We finally made it...
Better take a deep breath.
This seems like it could get pretty intense!
story_06_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Don’t worry about it so much!
The most important thing is to have fun.
